net.datenwerke.dbpool

Class MetaPoolService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.datenwerke.dbpool.MetaPoolService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DbPoolService

    public class MetaPoolService
extends java.lang.Object
implements DbPoolService
    A pool service that can either use BoneCpPoolServiceImpl or DbC3p0PoolServiceImpl as backend.
